description: This creamy mushroom pasta recipe is so easy to make. Baked feta and mushroom are tossed through cooked pasta for the ultimate cosy lunch or dinner.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian
name: Baked mushroom pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place mushroom on a large, shallow baking tray with sides. Place feta in centre of tray. Drizzle with oil, then sprinkle with garlic and thyme. Season. Bake for 25 minutes or until feta starts to brown.

Meanwhile, cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain. Remove tray from oven. Using a fork, crush feta and stir into mushroom mixture. Add pasta to tray and toss to combine. Scatter over extra parsley to serve.
